Method Detail

localToGlobal

public static final PointImpl localToGlobal(float x,
                                            float y,
                                            DisplayObjectImpl source)
Transforms the specified x and y position from the coordinate space of the source display object to the global (stage) coordinate space. For example, this could be used to position an HTML label over a specific point on a nested display object. Returns a Point instance with x and y properties correlating to the transformed coordinates on the stage.

Parameters:
x - The x position in the source display object to transform.
y - The y position in the source display object to transform.
target - The source display object.
Returns:
Point

globalToLocal

public static final PointImpl globalToLocal(float x,
                                            float y,
                                            DisplayObjectImpl source)
Transforms the specified x and y position from the global (stage) coordinate space to the coordinate space of the target display object. For example, this could be used to determine the current mouse position within a specific display object. Returns a Point instance with x and y properties correlating to the tranformed position in the target's coordinate space.

Parameters:
x - The x position on the stage to transform.
y - The y position on the stage to transform.
target - The target display object.
Returns:
Point

localToLocal

public static final PointImpl localToLocal(float x,
                                           float y,
                                           DisplayObjectImpl source,
                                           DisplayObjectImpl target)
Transforms the specified x and y position from the coordinate space of the source display object to the coordinate space of the target display object. Returns a Point instance with x and y properties correlating to the tranformed position in the target's coordinate space. Effectively the same as calling var pt = localToGlobal(x, y, source); pt = globalToLocal(pt.x, pt.y, target);

Parameters:
x - The x position in the source display object to transform.
y - The y position on the stage to transform.
source - The display object that the original position is relative to.
target - The target display object to which the coordinates will be transformed.
Returns:
Point

getConcatenatedMatrix

public static final Matrix2DImpl getConcatenatedMatrix(DisplayObjectImpl target)
Generates a concatenated Matrix2D object representing the combined tranform of the target display object and all of its parent Containers. This can be used to transform positions between coordinate spaces, as with localToGlobal and globalToLocal.

Parameters:
target - The target display object to which the coordinates will be transformed.
Returns:
